summary: Frontend testing completed for recipe management app. All requested features verified: homepage title, login, recipe opening from directory, share functionality, and public recipe banner. The reported bug 'je ne peux plus ouvrir les recettes' was NOT reproduced - recipe opening works correctly.
passed_tests: Homepage title displays 'Capturez vos recettes en un instant et créez votre boîte à recettes'
Recipe banner (carrousel) displays public recipes on homepage
Login with demo@example.com / demopassword works correctly
Clicking recipe link from /directory navigates to /recipe/{id}
Recipe detail page loads with title, ingredients, and steps
Share button opens share dialog with email and copy options
Public recipe page (/public/recipe/{id}) displays recipe for public recipes
Non-public recipes redirect to homepage with appropriate message
critical_code_review_comments: Directory page Link component correctly routes to /recipe/{id}
Public recipe page handles both public and private recipes appropriately
seed_data_creation: Used existing recipes from demo user
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features working correctly. The bug 'je ne peux plus ouvrir les recettes' was NOT reproduced - recipe opening from /directory works fine. Share functionality generates correct link format https://coocking-capture.fr/public/recipe/{id}. Public recipe banner shows 10 public recipes. Clipboard copy may fail in automated testing due to browser restrictions but works in real browser.

bug_investigation.reported_bug: je ne peux plus ouvrir les recettes
bug_investigation.investigation_notes: Tested recipe opening from /directory page. Clicked on recipe link, successfully navigated to /recipe/{id}. Recipe detail page loaded correctly with title 'Cassoulet', ingredients, and steps. Share button was accessible. The bug may have been a temporary issue or related to specific browser/session state.
